name: Six Sam
author: Danyel088
notes:
Kinda late kog, but happy that I got it with six sam with few wins.... I was hoping for bamboo shit to end, but unfortunately it looks that it will hold until the end of the season....

This decks was working fine... Only real problems I got with this was hazy and 3sd ninja, but econs can be changed for srh to help that. For the other decks in general, I think this build can work around then.
